How BattleZone Works

Start playing competitive esports matches in minutes. Follow these simple steps to begin your journey.

Get Started Now
üë§
Step 01

Create Your Account

Sign up with your email, phone number, and in-game ID. Verification takes just a few minutes.

üìã
Step 02

Complete KYC

Upload your Aadhaar or PAN card for identity verification. This ensures a secure gaming environment.

üí∞
Step 03

Add Funds

Deposit money securely via UPI, cards, or net banking. Minimum deposit is just ‚Çπ10.

üéÆ
Step 04

Browse & Join Matches

Choose from PUBG Mobile, BGMI, or Free Fire matches. Select your preferred game mode and entry fee.

üîë
Step 05

Get Room Details

Before match starts, receive room ID and password via app notification and in your dashboard.

üèÜ
Step 06

Play & Win

Join the room, compete with other players, and climb the leaderboard to win prizes.

üì∏
Step 07

Upload Results

After match completion, upload your game screenshot showing kills and rank for verification.

üí∏
Step 08

Withdraw Winnings

Once results are verified, winnings are credited to your wallet. Withdraw anytime via UPI or bank.
